name: Helivate Helicopter Services (Pty) Ltd
about: Helivate Helicopter Services (Pty) Ltd, established in 2011, is a comprehensive aviation service provider. We specialize in pilot training, offering a range of programs to equip aspiring pilots with the necessary skills. Our services also include helicopter charters, helicopter hire, and scenic flights over various South African landmarks such as Sandton CBD, Hartebeespoort Dam, and Soweto. Additionally, we provide aerial surveillance, VIP charters, aerial photography, and drone services. Our HeliOlympics initiative challenges pilots to enhance their accuracy and flying skills. With a focus on safety and excellence, Helivate Helicopter Services is dedicated to delivering top-notch aviation solutions. We strive to be the premier choice for all helicopter-related needs.
